verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֞ע <WH8085> heard שְׁפַטְיָ֣ה <WH8203> Then Shephatiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son מַתָּ֗ן <WH4977> of Mattan וּגְדַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH1436> and Gedaliah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son פַּשְׁח֔וּר <WH6583> of Pashur וְיוּכַל֙ <WH3116> and Jucal בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שֶׁ֣לֶמְיָ֔הוּ <WH8018> of Shelemiah וּפַשְׁח֖וּר <WH6583> and Pashur בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מַלְכִּיָּ֑ה <WH4441> of Malchiah אֶ֨ת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> the words אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> that יִרְמְיָ֛הוּ <WH3414> that Jeremiah מְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> had spoken אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> unto all the people לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying ס

כֹּה֮ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> the LORD הַיֹּשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> He that remaineth בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise יָמ֕וּת <WH4191> shall die בַּחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> by the sword בָּרָעָ֣ב <WH7458> by the famine וּבַדָּ֑בֶר <WH1698> and by the pestilence וְהַיֹּצֵ֤א <WH3318> but he that goeth forth אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכַּשְׂדִּים֙ <WH3778> to the Chaldeans [יִחְיֶה כ] (וְחָיָ֔ה <WH2421> will live ק) וְהָיְתָה־ <WH1961> and have לּ֥וֹ נַפְשׁ֛וֹ <WH5315> for he shall have his life לְשָׁלָ֖ל <WH7998> for a prey וָחָֽי׃ <WH2421> shall live ס

כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנָּתֹ֨ן <WH5414> shall surely תִּנָּתֵ֜ן <WH5414> be given הָעִ֣יר <WH5892> This city הַזֹּ֗את <WH2063> into בְּיַ֛ד <WH3027> into the hand חֵ֥יל <WH2428> army מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon's וּלְכָדָֽהּ׃ <WH3920> which shall take

וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> said הַשָּׂרִ֜ים <WH8269> Therefore the princes אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king י֣וּמַת <WH4191> be put to death נָא֮ <WH4994> Now אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> We beseech thee let this man הַזֶּה֒ <WH2088> this כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עַל־ <WH5921> for כֵּ֡ן <WH3651> for thus הֽוּא־ <WH1931> he מְרַפֵּ֡א <WH7503> he weakeneth אֶת־ <WH853> יְדֵי֩ <WH3027> the hands אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> unto them for this man הַמִּלְחָמָ֜ה <WH4421> of war הַֽנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים ׀ <WH7604> that remain בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in this city הַזֹּ֗את <WH2063> likewise וְאֵת֙ <WH853> יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> and the hands כָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> of all the people לְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> in speaking אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about כַּדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> such words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> such כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this אֵינֶ֨נּוּ <WH369> is not דֹרֵ֧שׁ <WH1875> seeketh לְשָׁל֛וֹם <WH7965> not the welfare לָעָ֥ם <WH5971> of this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> of this כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> but לְרָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> but the hurt

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king צִדְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH6667> Then Zedekiah הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold ה֖וּא <WH1931> he בְּיֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> Behold he [is] in your hand כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֵ֣ין <WH369> for הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> for the king יוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> [is] not [he that] can אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH854> for דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> do [any] thing

וַיִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> Then took אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <WH3414> they Jeremiah וַיַּשְׁלִ֨כוּ <WH7993> and cast אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into הַבּ֣וֹר ׀ <WH953> him into the dungeon מַלְכִּיָּ֣הוּ <WH4441> of Malchiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4429> Melech אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which בַּחֲצַ֣ר <WH2691> that [was] in the court הַמַּטָּרָ֔ה <WH4307> of the prison וַיְשַׁלְּח֥וּ <WH7971> and they let down אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah בַּחֲבָלִ֑ים <WH2256> with cords וּבַבּ֤וֹר <WH953> And in the dungeon אֵֽין־ <WH369> there מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> [there was] no water כִּ֣י <WH3588> but אִם־ <WH518> only טִ֔יט <WH2916> but mire וַיִּטְבַּ֥ע <WH2883> sunk יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> so Jeremiah בַּטִּֽיט׃ <WH2916> in the mire ס

וַיִּשְׁמַ֡ע <WH8085> heard עֶֽבֶד־ מֶ֨לֶךְ <WH5663> Now when Ebedmelech הַכּוּשִׁ֜י <WH3569> the Ethiopian אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one סָרִ֗יס <WH5631> of the eunuchs וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> which was in the king's כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> that they had put אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah אֶל־ <WH413> into הַבּ֑וֹר <WH953> in the dungeon וְהַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> then sitting בְּשַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> in the gate בִּנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> of Benjamin

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went forth עֶֽבֶד־ מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH5663> Ebedmelech מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> out of the king's וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> and spake אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> My lord הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הֵרֵ֜עוּ <WH7489> have done evil הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> men הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom עָשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> in all that they have done לְיִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <WH3414> to Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> the prophet אֵ֥ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom הִשְׁלִ֖יכוּ <WH7993> whom they have cast אֶל־ <WH413> into הַבּ֑וֹר <WH953> into the dungeon וַיָּ֤מָת <WH4191> and he is like to die תַּחְתָּיו֙ <WH8478> in the place מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> for הָֽרָעָ֔ב <WH7458> hunger כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֥ין <WH369> there הַלֶּ֛חֶם <WH3899> where he is for [there is] no more bread ע֖וֹד <WH5750> more בָּעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> in the city

וַיְצַוֶּ֣ה <WH6680> commanded הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king אֵ֛ת <WH853> עֶֽבֶד־ מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH5663> Ebedmelech הַכּוּשִׁ֖י <WH3569> the Ethiopian לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying קַ֣ח <WH3947> Take בְּיָדְךָ֤ <WH3027> with thee מִזֶּה֙ <WH2088> here שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> from hence thirty אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> men וְֽהַעֲלִ֜יתָ <WH5927> and take up אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֧הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֛יא <WH5030> the prophet מִן־ <WH4480> from הַבּ֖וֹר <WH953> out of the dungeon בְּטֶ֥רֶם <WH2962> before יָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> before he die

וַיִּקַּ֣ח ׀ <WH3947> took עֶֽבֶד־ מֶ֨לֶךְ <WH5663> So Ebedmelech אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH376> the men בְּיָד֗וֹ <WH3027> with him וַיָּבֹ֤א <WH935> and went בֵית־ <WH1004> into the house הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> of the king אֶל־ <WH413> about תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> beneath הָאוֹצָ֔ר <WH214> under the treasury וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> and took מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> there בְּלוֹיֵ֣ <WH1094> thence old [הַסְּחָבֹות כ] (סְחָבֹ֔ות <WH5499> cast clout ק) וּבְלוֹיֵ֖ <WH1094> and old מְלָחִ֑ים <WH4418> rotten rags וַיְשַׁלְּחֵ֧ם <WH7971> and let them down אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֛הוּ <WH3414> to Jeremiah אֶל־ <WH413> into הַבּ֖וֹר <WH953> into the dungeon בַּחֲבָלִֽים׃ <WH2256> by cords

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> said עֶבֶד־ מֶ֨לֶךְ <WH5663> And Ebedmelech הַכּוּשִׁ֜י <WH3569> the Ethiopian אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <WH3414> unto Jeremiah שִׂ֣ים <WH7760> Put נָ֠א <WH4994> Now בְּלוֹאֵ֨י <WH1094> now [these] old הַסְּחָב֤וֹת <WH5499> cast clouts וְהַמְּלָחִים֙ <WH4418> and rotten rags תַּ֚חַת <WH8478> under אַצִּל֣וֹת <WH679> joint יָדֶ֔יךָ <WH3027> able מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> under לַחֲבָלִ֑ים <WH2256> under the cords וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> did יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> And Jeremiah כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> so

וַיִּמְשְׁכ֤וּ <WH4900> So they drew up אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> Jeremiah בַּֽחֲבָלִ֔ים <WH2256> with cords וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> and took him up אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> out הַבּ֑וֹר <WH953> out of the dungeon וַיֵּ֣שֶׁב <WH3427> remained יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> and Jeremiah בַּחֲצַ֖ר <WH2691> in the court הַמַּטָּרָֽה׃ <WH4307> of the prison ס

וַיִּשְׁלַ֞ח <WH7971> sent הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king צִדְקִיָּ֗הוּ <WH6667> Then Zedekiah וַיִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> and took אֶֽת־ <WH853> יִרְמְיָ֤הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah הַנָּבִיא֙ <WH5030> the prophet אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> about מָבוֹא֙ <WH3996> entry הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <WH7992> unto him into the third אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> is in בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> that [is] in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <WH3414> unto Jeremiah שֹׁאֵ֨ל <WH7592> I will ask אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I אֹֽתְךָ֙ <WH853> דָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> thee a thing אַל־ <WH408> not תְּכַחֵ֥ד <WH3582> hide מִמֶּ֖נִּי <WH4480> at דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> anything

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> Then Jeremiah אֶל־ <WH413> to צִדְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH6667> unto Zedekiah כִּ֚י <WH3588> If אַגִּ֣יד <WH5046> If I declare לְךָ֔ הֲל֖וֹא <WH3808> not הָמֵ֣ת <WH4191> [it] unto thee wilt thou not surely תְּמִיתֵ֑נִי <WH4191> put me to death וְכִי֙ <WH3588> If אִיעָ֣צְךָ֔ <WH3289> ? and if I give thee counsel לֹ֥א <WH3808> you will not תִשְׁמַ֖ע <WH8085> wilt thou not hearken אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

וַיִּשָּׁבַ֞ע <WH7650> sware הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> the king צִדְקִיָּ֛הוּ <WH6667> So Zedekiah אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> unto Jeremiah בַּסֵּ֣תֶר <WH5643> secretly לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD [אֶת <WH853> כ] אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> who עָשָׂה־ <WH6213> that made לָ֨נוּ אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֶּ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> us this soul הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> us אִם־ <WH518> surely אֲמִיתֶ֔ךָ <WH4191> I will not put thee to death וְאִם־ <WH518> nor אֶתֶּנְךָ֗ <WH5414> neither will I give בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> thee into the hand הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH376> men הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> of these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who מְבַקְשִׁ֖ים <WH1245> that seek אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH5315> thy life ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <WH3414> Jeremiah אֶל־ <WH413> to צִדְקִיָּ֡הוּ <WH6667> unto Zedekiah כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֩ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֨י <WH430> the God צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אִם־ <WH518> If יָצֹ֨א <WH3318> If thou wilt assuredly תֵצֵ֜א <WH3318> go forth אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> princes מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> unto the king בָּבֶל֙ <WH894> of Babylon's וְחָיְתָ֣ה <WH2421> shall live נַפְשֶׁ֔ךָ <WH5315> then thy soul וְהָעִ֣יר <WH5892> and this city הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִשָּׂרֵ֖ף <WH8313> shall not be burned בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> with fire וְחָיִ֖תָה <WH2421> and thou shalt live אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> and you וּבֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1004> and thine house
